name: Kamik Jessie Rain Boots - Women's
description: Meet your new foul weather friends. These rain boots combine the full-on waterproofness of a rubber boot with the comfort and support of a sneaker. Kamik's lightweight rubber protects you from the elements without weighing you down, while the contoured footbed provides all-day comfort. The insole is lined with moisture-wicking mesh to help manage the internal climate, with an antimicrobial treatment to keep things fresh.100% waterproof.Lightweight, proprietary rubber is 100% recyclableVibrant printed floral lining.Contoured EVA footbed.Antibacterial insole is topped with moisture-wicking mesh.Grippy rubber outsole.
